Once you obtained noblesse status, you can fight for the title of hero!
Each town has an Olympiad Manager, the competition period is two weeks, each period, new heroes are chosen!

The daily battles will start in the evening, you will have a system message notifying you that the competition has started
You can register in class, none class and 3 on 3 battles, each queue has to have at least 11 people for matchmaking to start!
Wining and losing affect your olympiad points, which determine the period winner and also the reward of olympiad tokens that you will get at the end

Good luck!
